item.title: Suzi Quatro - It's So Easy
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 8520

It’s so easy
to fall in love
It’s so easy
to fall in love
People tell me
love’s for fools
Here I go breaking
all the rules
It seems so easy
oh so dog-gone easy
Yeah it seems so easy
well where
You’re concerned
my heart can learn
It’s so easy
to fall in love
It’s so easy
to fall in love
Look into your heart
and see
What your love book
has set aside for me
It seems so easy
oh so dog-gone easy
Yeah it seems so easy
well where
You’re concerned
my heart can learn
It’s so easy
to fall in love
It’s so easy
to fall in love-

It seems so easy
oh so dog-gone easy
Yeah it seems so easy
well where
You’re concerned
my heart can learn
It’s so easy
to fall in love
It’s so easy
to fall in love
It’s so easy
to fall in love
It’s so easy
to fall in love
It’s so easy
to fall in love
It’s so easy
to fall in love-
